website_summaries.verdict: Lacks bells and whistles, but is worth considering for those who need an affordable, entry-level model that can perform basic tasks.
pros: Has simple knob controls that are easy to use, making it a good choice for novices
9 useful stitches can accomplish numerous sewing tasks
cons: A few faulty models quit working properly after a fairly short time of purchase

product_meta.title: Singer Mechanical Sewing Machine, White
product_meta.description: The Singer Promise 1409 is an entry-level Singer sewing machine. The machine is very light, which means it is easy to transport. The 1409 comes with a good range of accessories, including a darning plate which allows for freemotion sewing.
feature_bullets: 9 stitch options - 6 utility stitches, 2 decorative stitches, 1 four step buttonhole
